name: Fighter Tactics
description:
Fighter Tactics is a Smash Bros inspired platforming fighter with a fire emblem inspired campaign. Capture the enemy castle before they take you out. You get two lives on the map and each tile cost a number of turns to move through. 

This game is currently in prototype phase and future features include a more defined overworld map, respawning enemies, health bars, stats, and impassable terrain. 

The art of this game comes from the Fighting Game Asset pack found here: 

https://thomas-lean.itch.io/assets
